title: Pompla Up The Volume With Jack Conte
description: Jack Conte is a musician and entrepreneur, and one-half of the group Pomplamoose with Nataly Dawn. He and his partner have had millions of people watch their videos on YouTube, and launched a successful career for their stripped-down but layered covers. Jack and Nataly also both have branched into solo work, and Jack recently launched a twist on "conventional" crowdfunding with Patreon, an artist-supporting site.
itunes:author: Glenn Fleishman
itunes:subtitle: Jack Conte is a musician and entrepreneur, and one-half of the group Pomplamoose with Nataly Dawn.
